title: Jazz recognized as ‘Best Operator in growth Market’ at WCA 2024
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 12 (APP): Jazz, country’s leading digital operator, was awarded with prestigious ‘Best Operator in a Growth Market’ award at the World Communication Awards (WCA) 2024.
According to a news release on Thursday, this honor highlights Jazz’s pivotal role in expanding digital access and bridging the digital divide in underserved communities across Pakistan.
The 26th WCA ceremony in London celebrated excellence and innovation in global telecommunications.
Kamila Khan, Jazz’s Chief Legal Officer, accepted the award, emphasizing Jazz’s commitment to digital transformation, connectivity, and community empowerment. Organized annually by Total Telecom since 1999, the WCA has become a hallmark of excellence, honoring leaders in connectivity and innovation.
“Receiving this award is a testament to our efforts in advancing digital inclusion and driving economic growth through innovative technology,” said Kamila Khan.
“It also reaffirms our position as a leader in Pakistan’s telecom sector and as a company dedicated to creating a meaningful impact on people’s lives by leveraging connectivity and digital tools to transform communities.”
Operating in Pakistan, the world’s fifth most populous country, Jazz has redefined connectivity and digital inclusion through a holistic approach. From expanding mobile and broadband access to running the country’s largest mobile banking platform JazzCash and driving impact with innovations like Garaj and Tamasha, Jazz continues to foster meaningful socio-economic progress.
